version_description:
In the mountains with no signal? No problem! OpenSummit now automatically saves weather forecasts once you've viewed them. Now you'll be able to see the forecasts even when you have no internet connection. We also cleaned up some visual dust that was produced as we rushed to construct the previous version.

Please help us improve the app by sending feedback to hello@opensummit.com. We usually respond within one day (sometimes much sooner!). 

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

In the mountains with no signal? No problem! OpenSummit now automatically saves weather forecasts once you've viewed them. Please help us improve the app by sending feedback to hello@opensummit.com. We usually respond within one day (sometimes much sooner!). 

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

We’re back to kick off the summer with a fresh update! In this release:

- Hourly precip changes color based on type.
- Hourly wind gust highlighted above sustained speed.
- Time of sunrise & sunset.
- Fixed a few other odds and ends.

Please help us improve the app by sending feedback to hello@opensummit.com. We usually respond within one day (sometimes much sooner!).

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

Summer 2017 is here! In this release:

- Highlighted the sustained wind speed and gust if 30+ mph.

ICYMI, June 5th release:

- Hourly precip changes color based on type.
- Hourly wind gust highlighted above sustained speed.
- Time of sunrise & sunset.

Please help us improve the app by sending feedback to hello@opensummit.com. We usually respond within one day (sometimes much sooner!).

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

Various bug fixes and performance improvements so that you're always prepared with the best weather information for Colorado's 14ers!

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensummit.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

Fixed a bug that prevented some logged-in users from opening the app. Sorry about this, and thanks for your feedback!

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensummit.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

Fixed a bug that prevented some logged-in users from opening the app. Sorry about this, and thanks for your feedback!

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensummit.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!

We’re on a quest to make things simpler and to provide even more value to our $19.99/year All-Access subscription. In doing so, we’re excited to share that we have combined all OpenSnow and OpenSummit accounts, including the All-Access subscription. 

One login and one subscription is all you need to see the All-Access features on BOTH OpenSnow and OpenSummit!

This update also includes:

• Email and password login.
• Instructions on how to reset your phone number login.
• Instructions on how to use your existing OpenSnow email and password to log in.
• Replaced the 'Profile' bottom navigation with an updated 'Settings' tab.
• Other minor improvements and bug fixes that you might not notice but make us feel good.

Please help us improve the app even more by sending feedback to hello@opensummit.com

Also, if you enjoy the app, please rate it and write a review on the App Store. Thank you!
